LanguageData.VBE_MakeLuciferiumPowder.label: make luciferium powder
LanguageData.VBE_MakeLuciferiumPowder.description: Make a very finely blended powder made from luciferium. Usually put around rims of alcoholic drinks in bars frequented by the wealthy and powerful.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeGoJuiceStock.label: make go-juice stock
LanguageData.VBE_MakeGoJuiceStock.description: Make a gelatinized cube of Go-Juice, able to be digested rather than injected. While it can be used in any meal, it is often melted into soups or used as a thickening agent in cocktails.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeWakeUpPowder.label: make wake-up powder
LanguageData.VBE_MakeWakeUpPowder.description: Make a crushed and powdered form of wake-up, surprisingly sweet and sometimes used as a replacement for sugar in desserts or dissolved into a morning espresso.
